alert.note: Alert for Brunswick (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 6:49PM EDT until June 12 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Brunswick County in southeastern North Carolina... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 649 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Oak Island, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Oak Island, Holden Beach, Caswell Beach, Bald Head Island, Yaupon Beach, Ocean Crest Pier, St. James, Southport, Long Beach, Varnamtown and Dosher Memorial Hospital. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
